page.title: 06BEAULIEU MOTOR MUSEUM
page.content: The Motor Museum is owned by Lord Montague. It has a wide range of activities for all ages. The main building contains cars dating from {1870}to {1970.} They have the {Gold Arrow}in the Motor Museum along with the {Blue {Bird. { }They have a monorail going round the Motor Museum to give people a bird's eye view of the area. This runs through the top of the main building so you get a good view of all the cars. They have a new ride called Wheels. It covers a hundred years of motoring. You sit in a small cart and go round and see the cars. { { }Lord Montagu has a firework display once a year. There is a wide range of fireworks and it is normally very good. { { }
